content.question: The figure above represents three particles with the charges shown that are held fixed at the corners of a square. Which of the following indicates the direction, if any, of the electric field at point <math alttext="P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: The figure shows an arrow extending upward and to the right.
The figure shows an arrow extending downward and to the left.
The figure shows an arrow extending horizontally to the right.
There is no electric field at point <math alttext="P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, so there is no direction.

content.answer: The figure shows an arrow extending upward and to the right.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
